column4: this is a bare bone install of ubuntu about 7Gb big and i have a 100Gb partition available should i just delete the 100Gb partition and DD the new partition on the new disk or perhaps use clonezilla ?
and how will the cloned Ubuntu react to the other partitions on the disk (and a different size swap ?
if i clone it how do i make sure the grub also gets cloned
is grub installed to the ubuntu partition?
